children.text: The finished floor level of this home is stepped/on different planes.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 2.07 Finished floor levels states that

‘Finished floor levels (FFL) or reduced levels (RL) are defective where floors are documented to be on the same plane but are constructed on different planes, or the building work is an extension or addition and new floor levels do not match the existing building floor levels’ .
The finished floor height of this area will need to be re-constructed in accordance with above.
